001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.TextView;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import com.kizitonwose.calendar.core.CalendarMonth;
010import com.kizitonwose.calendar.view.MonthHeaderFooterBinder;
011import com.kizitonwose.calendar.view.ViewContainer;
012import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ActivityContext;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.databinding.HeaderCalendarBinding;
015import java.time.DayOfWeek;
016import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
017import java.time.format.TextStyle;
018import java.time.temporal.WeekFields;
019import java.util.Locale;
020import java.util.stream.IntStream;
021import javax.inject.Inject;
022
023public class HeaderBinder implements MonthHeaderFooterBinder<ViewContainer> {
024
025  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
026  private final DateTimeFormatter formatter;
027
028  //a context parameter in Hilt can be an application class or an activity context
029  @Inject
030  HeaderBinder(@NonNull @ActivityContext Context context) {
031    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
032    formatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(context.getString(R.string.year_month_format));
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public ViewContainer create(@NonNull View view) {
037    return new HeaderHolder(view);
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public void bind(@NonNull ViewContainer container, CalendarMonth calendarMonth) {
042    ((HeaderHolder) container).bind(calendarMonth);
043  }
044
045  private class HeaderHolder extends ViewContainer {
046
047    private final HeaderCalendarBinding binding;
048    private boolean bound; //boolean primitive defaults to false
049
050    public HeaderHolder(@NonNull View view) {
051      super(view);
052      binding = HeaderCalendarBinding.bind(view);
053    }
054
055    public void bind(CalendarMonth calendarMonth) {
056      binding.monthYear.setText(calendarMonth.getYearMonth().format(formatter));
057      if (!bound) {
058        bound = true;
059        ViewGroup columnHeaderRoot = binding.dayNames;
060        columnHeaderRoot.removeAllViews();
061        DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek = WeekFields.of(Locale.getDefault()).getFirstDayOfWeek();
062        IntStream.range(0, 7)
063            .mapToObj(firstDayOfWeek::plus)
064            .forEach((DayOfWeek dayOfWeek) -> {
065              TextView dayHeader =
066                  (TextView) inflater.inflate(R.layout.day_header, columnHeaderRoot, false);
067              dayHeader.setText(
068                  dayOfWeek.getDisplayName(TextStyle.SHORT_STANDALONE, Locale.getDefault()));
069              columnHeaderRoot.addView(dayHeader);
070            });
071      }
072    }
073  }
074
075}
